name: Baku
description:
As the night dawns and children go to sleep, shadow figures gather from the dark. 

It's up to Baku, the Eater of Dreams, to chase evil spirits away and guard the resting of the innocent and the frail... Careful, shadow beasts..

The Team

This game was made for the Nordic Game Jam 2023 by:

  • Gonçalo Goulão - Artist
  • Mariana Santos - Artist
  • Eduardo Barrancos - Programmer
  • Paulo do Ó - Programmer
  • Paulina Wykowska - Programming and Artist

We are part of a college game dev group called GameDev Técnico.

You can find us here!
